Package test.java.com.warzone.services.impl

Class GameLoopServiceImplTest

java.lang.Object
test.java.com.warzone.services.impl.GameLoopServiceImplTest
public class GameLoopServiceImplTest extends Object
Unit tests for GameLoopServiceImpl focusing on the execution of user commands during the main game loop phase. This class ensures that the game loop service can correctly handle various phases and commands, reflecting changes within a GameSession.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    cleanUp()
    Cleans up the game session after each test case by clearing the previously created session.
    void
    setUp()
    Initializes the GameLoopServiceImpl and GameSession before each test case to ensure a fresh environment for testing the game loop's handling of user commands.
    void
    testMainGameLoopPhaseHandling()
    Verifies that GameLoopServiceImpl.handleGamePhase(GamePhase) correctly processes user commands during the MAIN_GAME_LOOP phase without throwing any exceptions.

  • Method Details

    • setUp

      @BeforeEach public void setUp() throws WarzoneValidationException
      Initializes the GameLoopServiceImpl and GameSession before each test case to ensure a fresh environment for testing the game loop's handling of user commands.
      Throws:
      WarzoneValidationException

    • testMainGameLoopPhaseHandling

      @Test public void testMainGameLoopPhaseHandling()
      Verifies that GameLoopServiceImpl.handleGamePhase(GamePhase) correctly processes user commands during the MAIN_GAME_LOOP phase without throwing any exceptions. It simulates user input for showing the map and exiting the game to test the method's resilience and correct behavior.

    • cleanUp

      @AfterEach public void cleanUp()
      Cleans up the game session after each test case by clearing the previously created session.
